title: DynamicsParams (Struct)
text:
TYPE DynamicsParams : STRUCT
Parameters for evaluating a dynamic model.

rows.Name: g
rows.Comment: The gravitational acceleration, defined in the MCS in u/sÂ².

rows.Name: load
rows.Comment: The load, defined in the end effector frame.

rows.Name: units
rows.Comment: Conversion factors from user units to SI units.
